name: Gasha-Boss
description:
Gasha - Boss

Andy is trapped in the arcades!

It seems that no matter how much he tries to get out there is something superior that won't let him escape... 

Join this little adventure to discover the mysteries of Gasha-Boss!

All assets are made by the dev team except the font

*This game has been developed in a week for the LevelUp gamejam, we hope you like it ^^*

Controls

- WASD to move

- E to interact

- Space to jump (In some minigames)

OST

Made by Alejandro Parra, you can find it here

Developers

We are Studios Agapito, a small group that has just been formed recently.

Our members are 

- Pablo Ramblado (Game Producer, RRSS)  

- Aaron Morales (Game Designer) 

- Lucia Hernández (Pixel Artist) 

-Eduardo Rodríguez y Ángel Díaz del Río (Programmers) 

- Alejandro Parra (Music Composer)
